Header.title: Simple, Transparent
Header.subtitle: Purchase credits as you go. No monthly subscription traps. Your credits never expire.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.a1: Each credit allows you to generate one 3D model from an image or text prompt. Credits are consumed only on successful generations.
FAQ.a2: No! Your credits never expire. Buy once, use them whenever you want. There are no monthly subscriptions or hidden fees.
FAQ.a3: All generated 3D models can be exported in GLB (for game engines like Unity & Unreal) and STL (for 3D printing). Both formats are included with every generation.
FAQ.q4: Can I use the models commercially?
FAQ.a4: Yes! All credit packs include a full commercial license. You can use your generated 3D models in games, products, marketing materials, and more.
FAQ.q5: How does the AI generation work?
FAQ.a5: Our AI analyzes your 2D image or text description and generates a detailed 3D mesh with textures. The process takes about 30 seconds and runs on priority GPU servers.

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.intro: Welcome to Bunshin 3D. By using our services, you agree to these terms.
Terms.section1Text: Our service allows you to generate 3D models using AI. You must use this service in compliance with all applicable laws.
Terms.section2Text: You retain rights to the models you generate, subject to the license granted to us to host and display them.
Terms.section3Text: The service is provided 'as is'. We are not liable for any damages arising from its use.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we handle your data.
Privacy.section1Text: We collect your email and uploaded images solely for the purpose of providing the service.
Privacy.section2Text: We do not sell your data. Your images are processed by our AI providers and stored securely.
Privacy.section3Text: You can request the deletion of your account and data at any time via your dashboard.

items.question: How does Bunshin 3D work?
items.answer: Bunshin 3D uses advanced AI to convert 2D images and text descriptions into 3D models in GLB and STL formats. Simply upload an image or describe what you want, and our AI generates a production-ready 3D model.

items.question: What formats are supported?
items.answer: We support GLB (for game engines like Unity and Unreal), STL (for 3D printing), and OBJ formats. All models come with optimized topology.

items.question: How many credits do I need?
items.answer: Standard quality costs 1 credit per generation. Premium quality costs 5 credits for cinema-grade results with photorealistic textures.

items.question: Do credits expire?
items.answer: No, your credits never expire. Buy once, use whenever you want.

items.question: Can I use the models commercially?
items.answer: Yes! All generated models are yours to use commercially, including for games, 3D printing, and professional projects.

items.question: How does the referral program work?
items.answer: Share your unique referral link. When a friend signs up, you get +2 credits. When they make their first purchase, you get +10 credits. There are no limits on referral earnings.
